WakeLockSentinelReleased.summary:
The read-only released property of the
interface returns a boolean that indicates whether
a has been released yet.
WakeLockSentinelReleased.value:
A boolean value, that is false until the
has been released (either through a call to
or because the lock has been released
automatically) and the event has been
emitted, after which it becomes true and no longer changes.
